page.title: 12 HOUSING
page.content:
IN WISEWOOD LOXLEY AND WORRALL WE HAVE FOUND ALL TYPES OF{HOUSING.}MOST OF THEM WERE{SEMI-DETACHED.}SOME OF THE HOUSES ARE OVER 100 YEARS OLD,WHILE OTHERS ARE ONLY JUST BEING BUILT. THE{TERRACED}HOUSES WERE IN ROWS OF ABOUT FIVE.NEARLY ALL THE TERRACED HOUSES WERE NEW .THE{DETACHED {HOUSES}WERE BIGGER BUT THEY ARE ONLY SEPARATED BY SMALL GAPS ABOUT ONE AND A HALF METRES WIDE .THE TERRACED HOUSES WERE ALL THE SAME SO IT MADE THE PART WERE THEY WERE MADE IT LOOK DULL.SOME OF THE OLD HOUSES HAD BEEN CLEANED BY SAND BLASTING AND THE GARDENS BEEN CLEANED.
WE COUNTED 788 HOUSES ALTOGETHER,WHICH ARE MADE UP LIKE THIS. DETACHED 28.5% TERRACED 16.1% SEMI DETACHED 45.2% FLATS 10.2%
